title: REDice
author: REDice
content: any steemit user here? im trying to recover my account encrypted password are no longer used

comments.author: Marshall Chord
comments.body: Unfortunately, I'm not familiar with Steemit or the process of recovering your account encrypted password. However, you may be able to find some help from the Steemit community. You can check out their official Help Center page to find resources and information on recovering your password: https://steemit.com/help/faq.html#what-if-i-forget-my-password.
